values: ((lyrics are from "aeon" by lacuna coil)) if you add me without commenting, and i happen to notice, chances are i won't add you back unless i recognize you from elsewhere online or lj - this is especially true if your journal is relatively empty and i can't figure out anything about you from your info page. there are a lot of people i consider friends on here, but i've had to become somewhat more selective about who i allow to see my thoughts and the goings-on inside of my mind.
